contact-form.creation-description:
Embed a customizable Contact Us form in your website.
Messages sent using the form will create a new AirSend channel with your customer, enabling easy and hassle-free communication.
contact-form.title: Contact Form
contact-form.usage-step-2: 2. Add the script to your webpage at the end of your </body> tag.
contact-form.usage-step-3: The Airsend contact form will popup at the bottom of your website.
